case_name: Plaintiffs v. Loblaw Companies Limited et al.
outcome_details: Settlement agreement reached in principle pending court approval
decision_factors: Approval required from Superior Courts of Ontario and Quebec
Separate administration for Ontario and Quebec due to class size and language requirements
summary: A settlement agreement in principle has been reached between the plaintiffs and Loblaw Companies Limited and associated entities regarding a price-fixing conspiracy related to packaged bread sold across Canada. The settlement amount of $500 million will be distributed between Ontario and Quebec classes, subject to court approval. The agreement includes expanded class definitions, appointment of class counsel, and provisions for settlement administration.
